text: István Bethlen (19 June 1946 – 4 September 2018) was a Hungarian economist and politician. He was a member of the National Assembly (MP) from MDF Budapest Regional List between 1990 and 1994. He was born in Cluj, Romania. Bethlen died on 4 September 2018 in Budapest at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Hungarian economists
title: István Bethlen
